title: The Factory - Recoleta
typeOfFood: Lacto, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Juice bar, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Third and newest branch in a chain of juice bars that also is a coffee shop and sandwich shop. Has a small selection of sandwiches, some of which are vegetarian - vegans please inquire if some could be made vegan. Juices are vegan and  freshly made-to-order using mainly locally sourced organic fruits and veggies. Shakes are not vegan.
